title: Macademi Wasshoi!
synopsis: Magician's Academy revolves around Takuto Hasegawa, who attends a magic academy that is not marked on any map. During a summoning spell exam, he accidentally creates a girl named Tanarotte, who happens to hold enough magical power to destroy his country, but fortunately Tanarotte professes undying loyalty (and love) to her "creator."
voices: ['Fukui, Yukari', 'Ise, Mariya', 'Miyazaki, Ui', 'Koshimizu, Ami', 'Terashima, Takuma', 'Tobita, Nobuo', 'Kawasumi, Ayako', 'Hiyama, Nobuyuki', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Shitaya, Noriko']
